mapper.sql: ITEM_ID, BUY_ORDER_NO, UNP_TYPE, PNUM, CHANGE_TYPE, GROUP_AMOUNT, ITEM_STATUS, POLICY, VALID
mapper.insert: insert into UNP_BUY_ITEM (ITEM_ID, BUY_ORDER_NO, UNP_TYPE, PNUM, CHANGE_TYPE, GROUP_AMOUNT, ITEM_STATUS, POLICY, VALID) values (#{itemId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{buyOrderNo,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{unpType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{num,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{changeType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{groupAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{itemStatus,jdbcType=BIT}, #{policy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{valid,jdbcType=INTEGER})

mapper.update:
update UNP_BUY_ITEM
BUY_ORDER_NO = #{buyOrderNo,jdbcType=BIGINT},
UNP_TYPE = #{unpType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
PNUM = #{num,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CHANGE_TYPE = #{changeType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
GROUP_AMOUNT = #{groupAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ITEM_STATUS = #{itemStatus,jdbcType=BIT},
POLICY = #{policy,jdbcType=INTEGER},
VALID = #{valid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where ITEM_ID = #{itemId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

UPDATE UNP_BUY_ITEM SET BUY_ORDER_NO = #{buyOrderNo,jdbcType=BIGINT}, UNP_TYPE = #{unpType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, NUM = #{num,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CHANGE_TYPE = #{changeType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, GROUP_AMOUNT = #{groupAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ITEM_STATUS = #{itemStatus,jdbcType=BIT}, POLICY = #{policy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, VALID = #{valid,jdbcType=INTEGER} WHERE ITEM_ID = #{itemId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
select
from UNP_BUY_ITEM where BUY_ORDER_NO = #{buyOrderNo,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND ITEM_STATUS='3' AND CHANGE_TYPE=0

select
from UNP_BUY_ITEM where BUY_ORDER_NO = #{buyOrderNo,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND ITEM_STATUS IN (1,3) AND CHANGE_TYPE=1
